articles.title: Amazon Echo Pop review: Alexa for less - The Verge
articles.description: At $40, the newest entry-level Echo smart speaker is cheaper, smaller, and comes in purple. It doesn’t sound as good as the Echo Dot, but it might find a good spot in your home.

As the latest entry-level Alexa smart speaker, the $40 Echo Pop packs a lot of value into a small package. Its not as good as the Echo Dot, but its got looks on its side.
